# ion-badge

Badges are simple components in Ionic containing numbers or text. You can display a
badge to indicate that there is new information associated with the item it is on.

```html
<ion-content>
  <ion-list>
    <ion-item>
      <ion-badge slot="start">
        34
      </ion-badge>
      My Item
      <ion-badge slot="end">
        2
      </ion-badge>
    </ion-item>
  </ion-list>
</ion-content>
```
